table.name: audited_tap_authorisation
table.viewSql: SELECT created_revision.username AS created_by, created_revision."timestamp" AS created_at, updated_revision.username AS updated_by, updated_revision."timestamp" AS updated_at, COALESCE(updated_audit.rev_type, created_audit.rev_type) AS rev_type, taa.id, taa.version, taa.person_identifier, taa.prison_code, taa.absence_type_id, taa.absence_sub_type_id, taa.absence_reason_id, taa.repeat, taa.status_id, taa.comments, taa.legacy_id, taa.start, taa."end", taa.schedule, taa.absence_reason_category_id, taa.reason_path, taa.accompanied_by_id, taa.transport_id FROM ((((temporary_absence_authorisation taa JOIN temporary_absence_authorisation_audit created_audit ON (((created_audit.id = taa.id) AND (created_audit.rev_type = 0)))) JOIN audit_revision created_revision ON ((created_revision.id = created_audit.rev_id))) LEFT JOIN temporary_absence_authorisation_audit updated_audit ON (((updated_audit.id = taa.id) AND (updated_audit.rev_type = 1) AND (updated_audit.rev_id = ( SELECT max(audit.rev_id) AS max FROM temporary_absence_authorisation_audit audit WHERE ((audit.id = taa.id) AND (audit.rev_type = 1))))))) LEFT JOIN audit_revision updated_revision ON ((updated_revision.id = updated_audit.rev_id)));

table.name: audited_tap_movement
table.viewSql: SELECT created_revision.username AS created_by, created_revision."timestamp" AS created_at, updated_revision.username AS updated_by, updated_revision."timestamp" AS updated_at, COALESCE(updated_audit.rev_type, created_audit.rev_type) AS rev_type, tam.id, tam.version, tam.person_identifier, tam.occurrence_id, tam.occurred_at, tam.direction, tam.absence_reason_id, tam.accompanied_by_id, tam.accompanied_by_comments, tam.comments, tam.recorded_by_prison_code, tam.legacy_id, tam.location FROM ((((temporary_absence_movement tam JOIN temporary_absence_movement_audit created_audit ON (((created_audit.id = tam.id) AND (created_audit.rev_type = 0)))) JOIN audit_revision created_revision ON ((created_revision.id = created_audit.rev_id))) LEFT JOIN temporary_absence_movement_audit updated_audit ON (((updated_audit.id = tam.id) AND (updated_audit.rev_type = 1) AND (updated_audit.rev_id = ( SELECT max(audit.rev_id) AS max FROM temporary_absence_movement_audit audit WHERE ((audit.id = tam.id) AND (audit.rev_type = 1))))))) LEFT JOIN audit_revision updated_revision ON ((updated_revision.id = updated_audit.rev_id)));

table.name: audited_tap_occurrence
table.viewSql: SELECT created_revision.username AS created_by, created_revision."timestamp" AS created_at, updated_revision.username AS updated_by, updated_revision."timestamp" AS updated_at, COALESCE(updated_audit.rev_type, created_audit.rev_type) AS rev_type, tao.id, tao.version, tao.authorisation_id, tao.start, tao."end", tao.accompanied_by_id, tao.transport_id, tao.contact_information, tao.comments, tao.legacy_id, tao.location, tao.schedule_reference, tao.absence_type_id, tao.absence_sub_type_id, tao.absence_reason_category_id, tao.absence_reason_id, tao.reason_path, tao.status_id FROM ((((temporary_absence_occurrence tao JOIN temporary_absence_occurrence_audit created_audit ON (((created_audit.id = tao.id) AND (created_audit.rev_type = 0)))) JOIN audit_revision created_revision ON ((created_revision.id = created_audit.rev_id))) LEFT JOIN temporary_absence_occurrence_audit updated_audit ON (((updated_audit.id = tao.id) AND (updated_audit.rev_type = 1) AND (updated_audit.rev_id = ( SELECT max(audit.rev_id) AS max FROM temporary_absence_occurrence_audit audit WHERE ((audit.id = tao.id) AND (audit.rev_type = 1))))))) LEFT JOIN audit_revision updated_revision ON ((updated_revision.id = updated_audit.rev_id)));
